Dialogue.text: Let's go guys! They should be somewhere around here.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: It seems that we have walked into a dead end.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: We are the Infinite Crab Brothers. What are you three doing in these waters
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: We are looking for our lost ship. It had sunk with all our cargo in it.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Manta told us he had gotten an egg from you, so we were wondering where you have gotten it from.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Oh, so you're friends with Manta?!
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: Wait, how do we know that we can trust you?
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: Only through a test can we tell if you're worthy. Then maybe! Just maybe! We might know something.
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: Do you think we should do this test?
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: But we need to know where they got the egg from!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally
